sentences.sContent: When the invasion occurred he seized power and ruled the country as a puppet of the occupiers.
sentences.sCn: 他趁入侵之时夺取了政权，作为占领者的傀儡统治着这个国家。

sentences.sContent: The government is in danger of becoming a mere puppet of the military.
sentences.sCn: 政府面临沦为军方傀儡的危险。

synos.tran: 木偶；傀儡；受他人操纵的人

remMethod.val: pup(小狗)+pet(宠物)→木偶不是像小狗一样的宠物→木偶

words.tran: 操纵木偶的人；操纵傀儡

trans.tranOther: a model of a person or animal that you move by pulling wires or strings, or by putting your hand inside it
